    BytePairEncoding.toStrTuple — Function.
    toStrTuple(x; ends)

    Turn string to a Tuple of each character in string. The last char will be concatenate with a ends. fefault ends = "</w>"

    #Example

    julia> x = toStrTuple("abcdef"; ends = "</w>")
("a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f</w>")
